description.brief: Pure divine energy that bypasses many defenses and provides special effectiveness against corrupted enemies.
description.detailed: Radiance damage represents the power of divine protection and guidance. Unlike elemental damage which affects the physical realm, radiance damage directly impacts the spiritual essence of targets. It is particularly effective against chaotic and corrupted entities while providing healing and protective benefits to allies.
description.visual_effects: Brilliant golden and white light with soft harmonic sounds, radiant beams, and protective aura effects
description.lore_explanation: Radiance damage channels the power of Aurelius, the Radiant Sphere, one of the three Primal Gods actively worshipped today. This represents the protective divine energy - the warm light that guides lost souls, heals the wounded, and creates barriers against harm while allowing growth within safe boundaries.

status_effects.description: Target takes increased radiance damage and reduced chaos damage
Allies near radiance damage sources gain damage reduction and regeneration

resistances.penetration_mechanics: Radiance damage bypasses physical armor but can be resisted by spiritual defenses

interactions.conditions: When radiance damage hits a chaos-affected target

interactions.result: Physical attacks become blessed, gaining radiance properties
interactions.conditions: When blessed weapons deal physical damage

temporal_aspects.chronarch_synergy: Stabilizes temporal abilities, reducing chaos and preventing temporal backlash
temporal_aspects.temporal_enhancement: Time-locked radiance effects can create persistent consecrated areas

build_archetypes.focus: Tank build with radiance damage and ally protection
Anti-chaos specialist with burst radiance damage
